projects.title: SAYTU
projects.description: This is the first application I've had to work on since I joined PTS. It's a web application enabling users to book an appointment for a technical inspection.

projects.title: LEKET
projects.description: I took part in the maintenance activities of this business management application, working on the back-end part in particular on maintenance management through the computer-aided maintenance management module (CMMS for PTS network stations), incident reporting, leave-taking...

projects.title: PUBC
projects.description: The most extensive application I've ever worked with. I gained a lot of experience thanks to this project. The IS consists of a mobile application for ordering fuel for individuals and companies, and a back office.

experience.company: ANACIM (National Civil Aviation and Meteorology Agency)
experience.title: Web Developer
